dItem.boxText: <font size='18'>Luther believed that salvation could be achieved through Good Works.</font>
<font size='18'>Luther believed that the Bible was the sole source of religious authority.</font>
<font size='18'>Luther believed in a “priesthood of all believers” with no distinction between the clergy and the laity.</font>
<font size='18'>Luther maintained all seven sacraments of the traditional Church.</font>
<font size='18'>Luther translated the Latin Bible into German so that ordinary people could read the Bible for themselves.</font>
<font size='18'>Luther believed Christians in Germany could ignore their secular rulers.</font>
